articles.content: A discovery by UVA researchers Dorian A. Rosen and Alban Gaultier led to a recent clinical trial that found that an antidepressant may stop COVID symptoms from worsening. Credit: Photos by Dan Addiso… [+5580 chars]

articles.title: Surging virus cases get a shrug in many Midwestern towns - msnNOW
articles.description: ELMWOOD, Neb. (AP) — Danny Rice has a good sense of how dangerous the coronavirus can be. What puzzles him are the people who have curtailed so much of their lives to avoid being infected by the virus.
